Class UserBusiness

  • java.lang.Object
    • msquerybuilderbackend.business.UserBusiness
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService, org.springframework.security.provisioning.UserDetailsManager

    @Component
 @Service
 @Transactional
public class UserBusiness
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.security.provisioning.UserDetailsManager
    Class for all activities with neo4j database regarding the entity User and its authorities
    Author:
    Roman
